en.instructorCoursesLimited: Limit number of courses per instructor
en.approveInstructorAccounts: Approve instructor accounts prior to access
en.approveStudentAccounts: Approve student accounts prior to access
en.contentBlockedCourseEnd: Block course content after course ends
en.passwordRequiredStartTest: Password required prior to starting test

errors.intGreaterThanZero: Must be an integer greater than zero
errors.betweenOneAndOneThousand: Must be a number between 1 and 1000
errors.greaterEqualToZeroLessThanOneHundred: Must be a number greater than or equal to 0 and less than 100
errors.greaterThanZeroLessThanEqualOneHundred: Must be a number greater than 0 and less than or equal to 100
errors.intGreaterThanEqualOneLessThanEqualOneHu: Must be an integer greater than or equal to 1 and less than or equal to 100
errors.greaterThanEqualPointOneLessThanEqualOne: Must be a number greater than or equal to 0.1 and less than or equal to 1000
errors.greaterThanEqualOneLessThanEqualOneThous: Must be a number greater than or equal to 1 and less than or equal to 1000
errors.dropGradeLessThanPassGrade: Minimum grade must be less than the pass grade
errors.passGradeMoreThanDropGrade: Pass grade must be more than the minimum grade
